content.en: Fiber Bragg Gratings: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the accuracy and precision of strain measurements using fiber Bragg gratings (FBGs). These algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and spectral analyzing algorithms, are applied to analyze reflection intensity spectra and reconstruct strain and temperature distribution profiles. By using these algorithms, researchers are able to achieve high-precision wavelength tracking, accurate strain reconstruction, and improved demodulation of strain sensors, making FBG sensors more effective in various applications.
content.da: Fiber Bragg-gitter: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre nøjagtigheden og præcisionen af deformationmålinger ved hjælp af fiber Bragg-gitter (FBG). Disse algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og spektralanalysealgoritmer, anvendes til at analysere refleksionsintensitetsspektre og rekonstruere profiler for deformation- og temperaturfordeling. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer kan forskere opnå højpræcisions bølgelængdesporing, nøjagtig deformationsrekonstruktion og forbedret demodulation af deformationssensorer, hvilket gør FBG-sensorer mere effektive i forskellige anvendelser.
